name: Twisted Arrow
description: Twisted Arrow is a first-person shooter that gives players adrenaline-packed arcade style action. Armed with a top secret combat bow and an arsenal of devastating arrows, you must traverse and fight your way through a city occupied by a high-tech army, mechs, zombies, and chemical monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 5 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: VR ONLY
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 5 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980ti Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: VR ONLY
